creator: HelloBetter
descriptionHtml:
Maintain or improve your mental well-being by taking one of our scientifically validated psychological online courses. Tackle depression, stress, anxiety, panic and other psychological disorders, accompanied by qualified psychologists and psychotherapists – soon available upon prescription!

HelloBetter is a medical product and thus complies with the strict safety and quality requirements of the Medical Devices Act.

How does it work?

-> Choose a course: Find a course that suits you and your needs. Our courses help with mental health problems such as stress, depression, anxiety, or trouble sleeping.
-> Choose a path: You can decide to be supported by one of our psychologists or psychotherapists, or take the course on your own, self-guided.
-> Start the course: No waiting times, just login and get started immediately.
-> Get feedback & see progress: Each step of the way you’ll receive personalised feedback and insights, and the tools to track your progress in a meaningful way.
-> Practice, implement, apply: You take the practical exercises and strategies learned in the course to better understand and manage your symptoms in everyday life.

In addition, the HelloBetter app supports you with:
-> Planning helpful activities that boost mood and motivation
-> Gentle reminders to pause and check-in by making a journal entry
-> Keeping track and reviewing your symptoms over time
-> Recognising progress and celebrating the small wins as well as the big
descriptionShort: The companion app to HelloBetter courses on depression, stress, anxiety & panic

title: HelloBetter

container.value:
HelloBetter – GET.ON Institut für Online Gesundheitstrainings GmbH,
Oranienburger Str. 86a,
10178 Berlin.

creator: HelloBetter
descriptionHtml:
THE HELLOBETTER COMPANION APP - The mobile supplement to your web-based course

Are you a participant in a HelloBetter course? Continue to do your course on your desktop and, in addition, download the HelloBetter app to:

- Plan energising activities that boost your mood and motivation
- Maintain a journal so you can track your growth and see changes in your daily check-ins
- Track and review your symptoms over time with a professional symptom check
- Recognise progress and form habits that support your mental well-being in the long run

HOW DOES IT WORK?
Our online mental health courses are highly evidence-based and developed by professional psychologists with a strong research background. We cover a wide range of mental health conditions, from depression, anxiety and insomnia to vaginismus and chronic pain. Depending on the course, you have the option of being professionally guided by one of our coaches, consisting of psychologists and psychotherapists.

COURSE ACCESS - STEP BY STEP
Choose a course: Visit our website and find a course that suits you and your needs.
Get a prescription or reimbursement: Some of our courses are already available on prescription, others can be reimbursed by certain insurance companies.
Get started on your desktop: No waiting times, just login.
Use our app for additional features: Review and integrate what you've learned.
Get feedback & see progress: Each step of the way you’ll receive personalised feedback and insights, and the tools to track your progress in a meaningful way.
Practice, implement, apply: You take the practical exercises and strategies learned in the course to better understand and manage your symptoms in everyday life.


WHAT OUR USERS SAY
“In HelloBetter I have found a very good training partner. The individual training units are very well structured and therefore very helpful. The regular feedback gives you an exact overview of what you have achieved so far.”

“HelloBetter brings a lot of structure to dealing with depression through the weekly course system. I often feel like I'm going in circles with depression, and HelloBetter makes it work better. In addition, HelloBetter is nicely presented (especially mood diary) and as an app it is a really modern way to work with it.”

ABOUT HELLO BETTER
We believe mental health is a human right. Everyone should be empowered to improve and maintain their mental well-being. With HelloBetter you can take immediate action. Choose from a wide range of online courses, get professional support by our coaches and learn the right methods and strategies of cognitive behavioral therapy.

HelloBetter has been reviewed and approved as a digital health application (DiGA) by the German Federal Institute for Drugs and Medical Devices. This ensures that the highest security and data protection standards are met.
descriptionShort: The companion app to HelloBetter's web-based mental health courses

10178 Berlin.

We cover a wide range of mental health conditions, from depression, anxiety and insomnia to vaginismus and chronic pain. Depending on the course, you have the option of being professionally guided by one of our coaches, consisting of psychologists and psychotherapists.

COURSE ACCESS - STEP BY STEP
Choose a course: Visit our website and find a course that suits you and your needs.
Get a prescription or reimbursement: Some of our courses are already available on prescription, others can be reimbursed by certain insurance companies.
Get started on your desktop: No waiting times, just login.
Use our app for additional features: Review and integrate what you've learned.
Get feedback & see progress: Each step of the way you’ll receive personalised feedback and insights, and the tools to track your progress in a meaningful way.
Practice, implement, apply: You take the practical exercises and strategies learned in the course to better understand and manage your symptoms in everyday life.


WHAT OUR USERS SAY
“In HelloBetter I have found a very good training partner. The individual training units are very well structured and therefore very helpful. The regular feedback gives you an exact overview of what you have achieved so far.”

“HelloBetter brings a lot of structure to dealing with depression through the weekly course system. I often feel like I'm going in circles with depression, and HelloBetter makes it work better. In addition, HelloBetter is nicely presented (especially mood diary) and as an app it is a really modern way to work with it.”

ABOUT HELLO BETTER
We believe mental health is a human right. Everyone should be empowered to improve and maintain their mental well-being. With HelloBetter you can take immediate action. Choose from a wide range of online courses, get professional support by our coaches and learn the right methods and strategies of cognitive behavioral therapy.

HelloBetter has been reviewed and approved as a digital health application (DiGA) by the German Federal Institute for Drugs and Medical Devices. This ensures that the highest security and data protection standards are met.

creator: HelloBetter
descriptionHtml:
With HelloBetter, you get effective psychological support - without waiting time, and free of charge on prescription. Psychological support - no matter where you are? You can get it with the HelloBetter app. Developed by psychologists and psychotherapists.



How does it work?



Step 1: Choose your HelloBetter online therapy course at HelloBetter.com.

Step 2: Get a prescription from a doctor for your chosen therapy course. (You can find all the information you need on HelloBetter.com).

Step 3: Send the prescription to your health insurance company - they will cover all costs.

Step 4: Your health insurance company sends you an access code - enter it at HelloBetter.de and you're ready to go.

Step 5: Download the app and take HelloBetter with you wherever you go.



Which HelloBetter courses do I get for free?


• HelloBetter Stress and Burnout

• HelloBetter Panic

• HelloBetter Diabetes and Depression

• HelloBetter Vaginismus Plus

• HelloBetter ratiopharm chronic pain



You can use all these online courses in the app, just as you can on your laptop or PC.



What does the app offer?



HelloBetter offers support for psychological complaints and is based on proven methods of cognitive behavioral therapy. The effectiveness of our online courses has been confirmed in clinical studies.



In the HelloBetter app, you can:

• Plan empowering activities that boost your mood and motivation

• Keep a diary to document changes

• Check the evolution of your symptoms over time with a professional symptom check

• Identify progress and develop habits that support your mental well-being in the long term.

• Be in contact with your personal HelloBetter psychologist and get personal feedback after each session.



About HelloBetter



Our mission is to make psychological support accessible to everyone, free of charge, and without waiting. With HelloBetter, you can take immediate action to care for your mental health. Find the online therapy course that's right for you.

During the course, you will be supported and guided by one of our psychologists. HelloBetter's digital health applications (DiGAs), are tested and approved by the Federal Institute for Drugs and Medical Devices. This means that the strictest safety and data protection standards are met.

What does the app offer?



HelloBetter offers support for psychological complaints and is based on proven methods of cognitive behavioral therapy. The effectiveness of our online courses has been confirmed in clinical studies.



In the HelloBetter app, you can:

• Plan empowering activities that boost your mood and motivation

• Keep a diary to document changes

• Check the evolution of your symptoms over time with a professional symptom check

• Identify progress and develop habits that support your mental well-being in the long term.

• Be in contact with your personal HelloBetter psychologist and get personal feedback after each session.



About HelloBetter



Our mission is to make psychological support accessible to everyone, free of charge, and without waiting. With HelloBetter, you can take immediate action to care for your mental health. Find the online therapy course that's right for you.

During the course, you will be supported and guided by one of our psychologists. HelloBetter's digital health applications (DiGAs), are tested and approved by the Federal Institute for Drugs and Medical Devices. This means that the strictest safety and data protection standards are met.

descriptionHtml:
With HelloBetter, you get effective psychological support - without waiting time, and free of charge on prescription. Psychological support - no matter where you are? You can get it with the HelloBetter app. Developed by psychologists and psychotherapists.



How does it work?



Step 1: Choose your HelloBetter online therapy course at HelloBetter.com.

Step 2: Get a prescription from a doctor for your chosen therapy course. (You can find all the information you need on HelloBetter.com).

Step 3: Send the prescription to your health insurance company - they will cover all costs.

Step 4: Your health insurance company sends you an access code - enter it at HelloBetter.de and you're ready to go.

Step 5: Download the app and take HelloBetter with you wherever you go.



Which HelloBetter courses do I get for free?


• HelloBetter Stress and Burnout

• HelloBetter Insomnia

• HelloBetter Panic

• HelloBetter Diabetes and Depression

• HelloBetter Vaginismus Plus

• HelloBetter ratiopharm chronic pain



You can use all these online courses in the app, just as you can on your laptop or PC.



What does the app offer?



HelloBetter offers support for psychological complaints and is based on proven methods of cognitive behavioral therapy. The effectiveness of our online courses has been confirmed in clinical studies.



In the HelloBetter app, you can:

• Plan empowering activities that boost your mood and motivation

• Keep a diary to document changes

• Check the evolution of your symptoms over time with a professional symptom check

• Identify progress and develop habits that support your mental well-being in the long term.

• Be in contact with your personal HelloBetter psychologist and get personal feedback after each session.
